name: Ruby
info:
An introverted and innocent girl who doesn't know much about the world. She is kinda afraid of strangers and prefers staying alone. Maybe that is why she is somewhat scared and shy in front of strangers. 
Always called "the kid with Madam Lin," she developed a sense of purposeâ€”she must work harder and become stronger so that she wouldn't be a burden to Lin or let Lin's instructions go in vain.
description:
The daughter of an old friend to Lin. And somehow, she's now taken care of by Lin, and they even take action together. The girl doesn't seem strong, like a sick, weak child. 
She is currently under combat skill training for self-protection upon Lin's request. Though Ruby is learning something quite different from Lin's style, she is, at least, much healthier than before and capable enough for quite some tricky situations. 
She still has nothing but a vague idea about the world and herself, believing in Lin's instructions and description blindly, and relying on her for almost every decision. In the current situation, Lin comments that cultivating her independence is definitely the priority here.

skills.name: Spark Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 5 times in a row. First Attack: Deal total damage equal to 84.6% of ATK plus 4 against each target. Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to 93% of ATK plus 5 against each target. Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to 101.5% of ATK plus 5 against each target. Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 109.9% of ATK plus 6 against each target. Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 253.7% of ATK plus 13 against each target and launches targets.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description: While airborne, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal total damage equal to 97.1% of ATK plus 5 against each target. Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to 106.8% of ATK plus 6 against each target. Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to 121.3% of ATK plus 6 against each target. Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 145.6% of ATK plus 8 against each target.

skills.name: Gotcha!
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack or do this after Lockdown Zone is triggered to continuously fire searing energy beams at enemies in a target direction, dealing damage equal to 40% of ATK plus 2. Consumes Wanderer's endurance.

skills.name: Blazing Dive
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Blazing Dive. Envelop the body in energy before rapidly plunging into the ground, dealing damage equal to 172.1% of ATK plus 9 to nearby targets.

skills.name: Lockdown Zone
skills.description: After the second normal attack, hold the button during any attack to deal damage equal to 40% of ATK plus 2 against the target. The locked-on target is confined and burned for 3 seconds, and damage equal to 26.2% of ATK plus 1 is dealt to the target every second (ineffective against bosses).

skills.name: Go, Dolly!
skills.description: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for 10 seconds, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to 84.6% of ATK plus 4 against them, as well as taunting them for 1.5 seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).

skills.name: Sparkling Collider
skills.description: Spark fires out Sparks that last for 15 seconds and bounce between the target and the Wanderer. Upon hitting the target, the Sparks slow it down for 4 seconds with a 15-second cooldown. Sparks deals more damage the further they travel. On hit, they deal damage up to 350% of ATK plus 37 and inflict a 25-second Emblazen mark on the target. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets with each bullet dealing damage equal to 50% of ATK plus 3 against its target. Spark's normal attacks deal 110% more damage to Emblazen-marked targets. When Sparks hit targets burned by the Wanderer, they burn or ignite the target once and deal additional damage equal to 100% of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are counted together). The Result calculation cooldown is 6 seconds and the skill cooldown is 30 seconds. "Passive: When Sparks is active, each time Spark Attack deals damage, the Wanderer gains 1 point of Heat with a 0.9-second cooldown, for up to 8 points of Heat. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Wanderer gains the effect Ultimate Heat, increasing flame ATK by 25% for 25 seconds.

skills.name: Supernova
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting wide-area searing energy beams at the target location before eventually exploding. Deal damage equal to 750% of ATK plus 39. If the target has a self-inflicted burning effect, then burn or ignite it once and deal additional damage equal to 100% of the total remaining damage (multiple burning or ignition effects are counted collectively). The result calculation cooldown is 6 seconds. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for 2.6 seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for 8 seconds, dealing damage equal to 58% of ATK every second. While Ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by 50%.

weapon_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Increase flame ATK by 20% and flame resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

advancement: Emblazen increases the damage of Spark Attack to 80%. Skill cooldown drops to 24 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Emblazen increases flame boost by 8% and the burn tally multiplier to 150%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
Restore an additional 75 points of weapon charge each time Spark Attack hits an enemy. Cooldown: 0.9 seconds. Shatter increases by 25% when Ultimate Heat is active.
Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark Attack to 160% and doubles Heat acquisition efficiency. Skill cooldown drops to 16 seconds.

traits.name: Dreamcatcher
traits.description: Increases the flame damage taken by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by 8%. This effect does not stack.

traits.name: Dolly's Domain
traits.description: Increases the flame damage received by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by 8%. Not stackable. Increases flame ATK after throwing Dolly by 12% for 10 seconds. This effect does not stack.
